Text:
They do ok until they start talking about the Twin Towers...then they reach into the realm of insanity and destroy their credibility totally. It's a shame.
Stupid bastards if you didn't believe the 9/11 "Conspiracy" you might have made a valid film, but instead you look like and ARE a bunch of numbnut conspiracy fucks. Albeit correct about Obama on most points you destroyed your credibility...that's sad. Morons.

@Crawling_chaos007

If you're going to call someone an insane moron, I think you skip Alex Jones, who's just a filmmaker. Why not attack 20-year Marine Corps infantry and intelligence officer, the second-ranking civilian in U.S. Marine Corps Intelligence, and former CIA clandestine services case officer, David Steele, who holds Cheney responsible for 9/11? You can do it in person if you are in New York City for the 9/11 Conference for Peace, Truth, and a New Economics. There will be some 9/11 family members there you can attack as well. Please report back on your experiences.

http://www.washingtonsblog.com/2009/09/former-high-ranking-intelligence.html

http://www.wedemandtransparency.com/schedule.html

'I liked the crazy stuff about O'bama, but they went too far with 9/11!' Priceless. A lesson there somewhere....

Citizen's End may wish to reflect that using unconvincing 'argument from authority' or emotional blackmail does not counter a lack of evidence or the question of impartiality, which a victim sadly (but obviously) may not be. 

Goodnight and good luck!
